<div class="alert alert-info">
For each class period ("Date"), the module to prepare for is shown under "Topic." Some of the more distant dates are subject to change.
</div>


```{r echo=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')

d <- readxl::read_excel("Dates_F20A.xlsx") %>%
  dplyr::filter(SHOW) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(Date=as.Date(Date),
                Date=paste(substr(DOW,1,1),format(Date,"%b-%d")),
                Topic=ifelse(is.na(url),Topic,
                       paste0('<a href=\"../modules/',url,'\">',Topic,'</a>'))) %>%
  dplyr::select(Date,Topic) %>%
  dplyr::add_row(Date=NA,Topic=NA_character_,.after=grep("F",d$Date)[1])

knitr::kable(d,format="html",escape=FALSE) %>%
  kableExtra::kable_styling(bootstrap_options=c("condensed","hover","responsive"),
                            full_width=FALSE,position="center",
                            fixed_thead=TRUE)
```
